flawed_nl_solution:
Out of the 40, 40 x 1/10 = <<40*1/10=400/1>>400/1 students are absent.
So, 40 - 400/1 = <<40-400/1=-360>>-360 students are present in school.
Out of the -360, -360 x 3/4 = <<-360*3/4=-270>>-270 students are in the classroom.
This means, -360 - -270 = <<-360--270=-90>>-90 students are in the canteen.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 400/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
